headline: Exclusive: Alpha Modus files lawsuit against Lowe’s over AI retail patents
summary: Investing.com -- Alpha Modus (NASDAQ:AMOD), a technology provider specializing in AI-driven retail solutions, has filed a patent infringement lawsuit against Lowe’s Companies (NYSE:LOW), Investing.com has learned.

headline: Trex Company: Composite Decking Leader With Potential For High Growth, But Lofty Valuation - Hold
summary: Trex Company leads the composite decking market, leveraging its pioneering status and strong brand. See why I rate TREX stock a Hold right now.

headline: Lowe’s completes $8.8bn acquisition of Foundation Building Materials
summary: FBM will continue to operate under the leadership of its founder, Ruben Mendoza, and its existing senior management team.

headline: Q2 Earnings Highs And Lows: Lowe's (NYSE:LOW) Vs The Rest Of The Home Furnishing and Improvement Retail Stocks
summary: The end of the earnings season is always a good time to take a step back and see who shined (and who not so much). Let’s take a look at how home furnishing and improvement retail stocks fared in Q2, starting with Lowe's (NYSE:LOW).
